title: Pat maximizes utility buying apples and candy

content.question: Assume Pat spends all of her allowance to purchase 4 apples and 4 candy bars. Patâ€™s marginal utility of the fourth apple is 20 utils, and her marginal utility of the fourth candy bar is 40 utils. If an apple costs $1.00 and a candy bar $0.50, to maximize utility Pat should

choices.label: purchase more apples and more candy bars
maintain the current purchase of 4 apples and 4 candy bars
purchase more apples and fewer candy bars
purchase fewer apples and more candy bars
purchase fewer apples and fewer candy bars

content.answer: purchase fewer apples and more candy bars
